oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Distributed filter processes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: JOSHI, RK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: evolution
systems
distributed processes
dynamic evolution
filter processes
cooperative filters
transparency
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A programming model called distributed filter processes for transparent filtering in distributed systems is presented. Filter processes are modelled as extensions to distributed processes. Messages can be captured transparently by intermediate filter processes. The programming abstractions are presented with applications to the evolution of programs. Copyright (c) 2005 John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: 11th Magdeburg Seminar on Waters in Central and Eastern Europe,Leipzig, GERMANY,OCT 18-22, 2004
